On Thursday 07 October 2004 21:06, svaddiparti wrote:
>  Hi,
>
>  Can somebody help me in a methodology for estimating the effort
>  required for developing JUNIT test cases/classes for a complex
>  websphere based application.
>
>  appreciate you can share some ideas as to how to go about.

Make a first stab (over-estimate).  As you become more and more familiar with 
writing tests your estimates will get better.  It's just a matter of 
practice.  I doubt anyone can come up with a generic scheme.  An estimate of 
writing tests is dependent on many variables:
  1. whether its being written TestFirst
  2. if it's pre-existing code, how easy is it to test
  3. how familiar you are with testing strategies
  4. how much test coverage you are looking for
  5. etc., etc., etc.

-- 
Jason Rogers
